name: TOKY
tagline: St. Louis Branding and Design Consultancy
description:
TOKY is a full-service branding and design consultancy that has developed a national reputation for helping organizations create brand strategies that differentiate and delight prospective clients and recruits. TOKY uses those brand differentiators to create brand identities, compelling websites, and marketing strategies. 
We focus on branding and design for a handful of client markets, including construction firms; cultural organizations; private schools; universities; and professional services.
